Bill Burke wrote:
>  
> 
> 
> 
> Eric J. Bowman wrote:
>  >> To be fair....
>  >>
>  >> The two transaction specifications (compensation and 2pc) were
>  >> written 8 years ago. The messaging one was a simple exercise I did
>  >> to create a facade over an existing messaging implementation (JMS).
>  >>
>  >
>  > Right, there's absolutely no concept of REST resources in them. The
>  > challenge is to model these component interactions as transfers of
>  > resource representations. The first step is to identify your resources
>  > and figure out how they relate to one another.
>  >
> 
> I'm finally catching up and put some of my ideas in writing for
> messaging its a bit more resource focused with opaque URLs and link
> relationships defined. It will need further revisions on how its
> presented and formatted.
>
